alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 24 at 5:57PM CST until January 24 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... Southern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CST. * At 557 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morse, or near Mermentau, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowley, Scott, Rayne, Mermentau, Duson, Morse, Riceville, Mire, Indian Bayou, Egan, Lyons Point, Ridge, Estherwood and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 73 and 96. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for south central, central and southwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for south central, central and southwestern Louisiana.
